text: Malaa, di mee hua ne angadonu, tangada dauwa o Syria ne puu adu hua dana amu maalei, ga nngenge i king Ahab, i di gowaa dela e duudagi i dono gahu dela e abaaba dono huaidina. Gei Ahab ga wolo adu gi tangada dagidagi dana waga dauwa boloo, “Au gu lauwa! Luia di waga, gidaua gaa llele gi daha mo tauwa!”
